response.explain: The previous action code has successfully opened the fridge without any errors. Now, the next step is to take the shrimp out of the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the shrimp out of the fridge
(3) Put the shrimp into the frying pan
(4) Cook the shrimp
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Take the shrimp out of the fridge
    shrimp = registry(env,"shrimp_203")
    EasyGrasp(robot, shrimp)
    donothing(env)
